name: HSPC_BENEFIT_PRDS
description: This table contains hospice benefit period information.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSPC_START_DT
columns.description: This item stores the start date for any hospice benefit periods.

columns.name: HSPC_END_DT
columns.description: This item stores the end date for any hospice benefit periods.

columns.name: HSPC_CTI_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the signature status of the certificate of terminal illness for the hospice benefit period.

columns.name: HSPC_CTI_SIGN_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date that the certificate of terminal illness (CTI) was signed for each hospice benefit period.

columns.name: HSPC_COMMENTS
columns.description: Free text comments about hospice benefit periods. Could be used to indicate where the patient received care for this benefit period, if at an outside agency.
